title: [1508521049] Hand-made Mint Chocolate Truffles (Part 1) - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Gordon Ramsay and his little helpers make Mint chocolate Truffles using dark chocolate, mint, double and single cream and honey. Part 2 here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46x_NjRaUIA

The most delicious Christmas recipes, cooked up by the world's greatest chef at home, "Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Christmas" will teach you everything you need to know to cook up the perfect Christmas.

______________


The official Youtube channel of Gordon Ramsay with exclusive clips from a selection shows including Cook-a-long Live, Gordon's Great Escape and more.

To find out more about Gordon Ramsay visit:
http://www.gordonramsay.com

http://www.facebook.com/Gordonramsay01
Follow Gordon Ramsay on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/GordonRamsay01
For a collection of Christmas recipes, see this playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL34337A40659C5BF7&feature=viewall
